record.id: field.name="action.names" and file.name="extaccess" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: action.names
record.file.name: extaccess

brief.brief: The name you want to use in the Web Services API to identify the Document Engine display actions for this table.

Since this name becomes part of the WSDL, the name must consist of alphanumeric characters valid for XML. The name cannot consist of XML reserved characters such as brackets (<) and (>), colons (:), or quotation marks (").

detail.detail: The name you type for this field becomes the alias name for the display action and becomes part of the Web service WSDL. For example, if you type Create for the add action, then the valid SOAP operations for this table are CreateIncident and CreateIncidentResponse.
